name: Lidarr
longDescription: Autoscan replaces the default Plex, Emby and Jellyfin behaviour for picking up file changes on the file system. Autoscan integrates with Sonarr, Radarr, Readarr, Lidarr and Google Drive to fetch changes in near real-time without relying on the file system.
description: Autoscan replaces the default Plex, Emby and Jellyfin behaviour for picking up file changes on the file system.
